clean_data: Virtual Private Cloud Production Engineer Virtual Private Cloud Production Engineer Software Developer El Paso TX Ernesto Maldonado Thomas is a Computers Systems Engineer who use his knowledge and skills to analyze to design and to implement software solutions that help in the streamlining and continuous improvement of the processes andor services that the company provides He also is able to solve problems quickly designing and implementing software components Sponsorship required to work in the US Work Experience Virtual Private Cloud Production Engineer El Paso TX El Paso TX February 2018 to Present Resolve problems or incidents within the IT Cloud Platform Services area utilizing Agile and DevOps practices Problem records include detailed description and classification of the problems Work or assign the problem and take ownership of the problem record until complete Apply problem solving skills to investigate and diagnose IT problems within Cloud Technologies as well as other related IT areas specially related to disruptive technologies Using root cause analysis method identify the primary and contributory causes Assign tasks as required to assist in the identification of the causes Involve internal team as well as external or global teams required for resolving issues Coordinate the different global teams or individuals required to resolve the error Manage communications and as the process to identifying a potential solution progresses and document full details to resolve the problem Escalate problems when service level targets are not met or at risk during the problem lifecycle and determine appropriate next steps Communicate detailed plans to management Perform Proactive Analysis by collecting and analyzing data both internal and external to identify trends and problems The result of this proactive analysis should be a reduction in the number of incidents and problems over time As new offerings and business areas continue to grow lead several teams in Agile DevOps environment and utilize management skills to coordinate problem management as previously described As new areas continue to grow demonstrate management skills by delegate efficiently to keep the team moving at an acceptable rate Establish trust within the new teams to develop strong support areas Apply a strong vision for the future both in the technology and business areas Apply extensive experience in sustain and development areas to implement continuous improvement in technical realms as well as process areas and communicate plans to management Develop and assess technical performance improvement plans for teams and individual members Work with engineers as a mentor in answering their questions to technical impediments and provide solution guidance Conduct technical interviews Support other projects to provide guidance and mentoring in multiple technologies Coordinate and conduct events to improve El Paso RDC skills such as Tech talks Brownbags
